title: Vigo
name: Marengo Style
content: Fashion store in Vigo's Comercial Zone (Zona Centro) where you can find Spanish fashion brands for women, such as Rosalita McGee, PepaLoves, TitisClocthing, Compañía Fantástica or Tiralahilacha. Marengo also has an ecommerce site, where you can order your clothes from any place in Europe.
